data.meanings: to bury (the dead). aqbara - to cause to be buried, have a grave day, have anyone buried. Grave, tomb, intermediate state in which the soul lives after death till the resurrection. maqabir - cemetery, place of burying.
data.sentence: The word الْقُبُورُ comes from the root ق ب ر and is associated with the meanings: to bury (the dead). aqbara - to cause to be buried, have a grave day, have anyone buried. Grave, tomb, intermediate state in which the soul lives after death till the resurrection. maqabir - cemetery, place of burying.

data.meanings: scatter abroad, turn upside down, to overthrow.
data.sentence: The word بُعْثِرَتْ comes from the root ب ع ث ر and is associated with the meanings: scatter abroad, turn upside down, to overthrow.
